item.title: Victoria add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Getting an education was a bit like a communicable sexual disease. It made you unsuitable for a lot of jobs and then you had the urge to pass it on." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Victoria add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "What did I tell you about Mister Safety Catch?' said Vimes weakly. When Mister Safety Catch Is Not On, Mister Crossbow Is Not Your Friend,' recited Detritus, saluting." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Victoria add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Juliet's version of cleanliness was next to godliness, which was to say it was erratic, past all understanding and was seldom seen." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Victoria add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "Am I hideous, Jane? Very, sir: you always were, you know." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Victoria add a quote by Ilona Andrews
item.description: "The vampire stared at me, his mouth slack as Ghastek assessed his options. I took a couple of forms from my desk, put them into the vamp's mouth, and pulled them up by their edges. "What are you doing?" Ghastek asked. "My hole puncher broke." "You have no respect for the undead." -- Ilona Andrews

item.title: Victoria add a quote by Ilona Andrews
Victoria add a quote by Gail Carriger
item.description: "Steampunk is...the love child of Hot Topic and a BBC costume drama" -- Gail Carriger

item.title: Victoria add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "If you are allergic to a thing, it is best not to put that thing in your mouth, particularly if the thing is cats." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Victoria add a quote by Edward Gorey
item.description: "Books, Cats, Life is Good." -- Edward Gorey

item.title: Victoria add a quote by Neil Jordan
item.description: "Is it fair to have given us the memory of what was and the desire of what could be when we must suffer what is?" -- Neil Jordan
